misuses.description: The code uses the default constructor of PBEKeySpec, which uses the platform's default random number generator to generate a salt. This is not secure because the entropy of the salt is not sufficient, and an attacker may be able to guess the salt and crack the password.
misuses.recommendation: Use a cryptographically secure random number generator to generate the salt, such as SecureRandom.
